statements: SELECT * FROM survey_data ORDER BY survey_date DESC, rating ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, rating FROM survey_data WHERE rating > 3
SELECT customer_id, survey_date FROM survey_data WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT survey_id, rating, comments FROM survey_data ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY survey_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM survey_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date FROM survey_data WHERE comments LIKE '%great%'
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM survey_data
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date, rating, comments FROM survey_data WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM survey_data;
SELECT survey_name, survey_result FROM survey_data;
SELECT customer_id, survey_name FROM survey_data ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_profiles WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE survey_result = 'Positive' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT survey_name, survey_result FROM survey_data WHERE survey_result = 'positive';
SELECT survey_name, survey_result FROM survey_data WHERE survey_result = 'negative' ORDER BY survey_name DESC;
SELECT survey_name, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM survey_data GROUP BY survey_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM survey_data;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, survey_response FROM survey_data WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_details FROM personalized_interactions WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_id, date_of_birth, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT survey_id, survey_response FROM survey_data WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customer_profiles WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';

SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, p.interaction_date FROM customer_profiles c INNER JOIN personalized_interactions p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM SurveyData;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM CustomerProfiles ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC;
SELECT response_id, survey_id, customer_id, response_date FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_date < NOW();
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM ServiceInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'query' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyData LIMIT 10;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY survey_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT cp.first_name, cp.last_name, sr.response_text FROM CustomerProfiles cp JOIN SurveyResponses sr ON cp.customer_id = sr.customer_id WHERE sr.response_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sr.response_date LIMIT 5;

SELECT si.interaction_id, si.customer_id, si.interaction_date, si.interaction_type, cp.first_name AS customer_first_name FROM ServiceInteractions si LEFT JOIN CustomerProfiles cp ON si.customer_id = cp.customer_id ORDER BY si.interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT sd.survey_id, sd.survey_date, sr.response_text, cp.first_name AS customer_first_name, cp.email AS customer_email FROM SurveyData sd JOIN SurveyResponses sr ON sd.survey_id = sr.survey_id JOIN CustomerProfiles cp ON sr.customer_id = cp.customer_id WHERE sd.survey_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sr.response_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sd.survey_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'call'
SELECT recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM customer_recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT cr.customer_id, cr.recommendation_text, ci.interaction_date FROM customer_recommendations cr JOIN customer_interactions ci ON cr.customer_id = ci.customer_id ORDER BY ci.interaction_date DESC;
SELECT sq.question_text, sq.question_category, sr.satisfaction_score FROM survey_questions sq JOIN survey_responses sr ON sq.question_id = sr.response_id WHERE sr.satisfaction_score > 4;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE name LIKE 'J%' AND phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
